name: Anita I. Hale - Real Estate
text: I was curbside delivery. They called me to make sure they understood my notes correctly so my order would be right. They took the extra step. I appreciate that.

name: Kimberly Reid
text: There are a variety of fresh ingredients to add to your pizza. The manager and staff were professional and kept each station clean. My pizza was yummy with the olive oil drizzle.

name: evelyn koster
text: I'll be quick and brief with this survey. The pizza was some of the best I've had in this particular area. They have the best crust that just hits the spot. The sauce and toppings were great as well. Absolutely love the pizza.

name: Chrissy Cakes
text: A co-worker recommended this spot Blaze Pizza to me. I thoroughly enjoyed it!  I have always gotten Fellini's pizza... but now working in akers mill square..I've got options!  I got a cheese pizza and brownie.  I was very pleased. The pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Ali Sabado
text: Fast and easy personal sized pizzas on a flatter crust. Good choice for lunch and their flavored juice/lemonade are really great.

name: Jamie Barker
text: Keto crust pizza is excellent. Not a lot of flavor which allows the toppings to shine but crisps up well giving a great thin crust experience.

name: Deron Smithwick
text: Finally went to Blaze pizza where you can buy one of their signature pizzas or you can make your own like,  MOD or Your Pie. We choose to make our own. My son is standard Pepperoni guy my pizza has a variety of toppings. The good in my ‚Ä¶More

name: Martha Sammons
text: This pizza is a close to honest Italian pizza as I have had since being in Roma.  The crust is truly indescribable and anything you choose to put on it is as fresh as it comes   I‚Äôll never spend another penny on any other pizza.   Just amazing

name: Vicki Thomas
text: Hubby‚Äôs 1st time here and he wasn‚Äôt disappointed.

name: Chris Smith
text: This is the first time I've ever had an uncomfortable experience with one of the people making my pizza. I usually come in here a few times a month before the shutdown and this was my first time back there in probably 2 months. I always get ‚Ä¶More

name: Van Salter
text: HIGHLY surprised by this place. When I walked in and saw it was an Uncle Maddio's/Your Pie counter-prepare then throw it in the oven type place I almost turned back around. I have never been to one of these type restaurants and had a good ‚Ä¶More

name: Angel Ortiz
text: Best experience we ever had our team loved the food and Jackie was amazing definitely recommend!

name: Kristin Handy
text: So happy to find a place where I can eat gluten and dairy free and its still tasty!

name: Matthew Williams
text: The customer service and the whole team where Awesome, and my pizza was Delicious!

name: Gehan A.
text: Super place. First time here and we really enjoyed with every bite of pizza. The pizza is very tasty with fresh ingredients. The staff are freindly. I highly recommend this place.

name: Ian Trutt
text: Went in for the first time recently and was blown away.  The prices are reasonable ($8.25 for unlimited toppings), and the pizza is big enough for you to save some for later.  The ingredients all look so FRESH, especially in comparison to ‚Ä¶More

name: Kelley Crews
text: Pizza is super bland with no taste. Tried 3 different times, taste burnt as well. There are better pizza places to go. Gets 2 stars because they dont overcharge for all the toppings you want

name: Paul Long Jr
text: So my youngest was very sad when we didn't eat Blaze Pizza during our last trip to Disney World. I honestly thought the Blaze and Disney where connected because the only 2 I'd ever seen was at Disney Springs and near Disneyland. I'm glad to ‚Ä¶More

name: derrick louis
text: Keto crust not amazing but given my options... A life saver. I also enjoy their pickup process... Food is done so fast.

name: ladydread922
text: Food is always good but the staff before the register could use some communications training. Too much attitude while making food

name: Jeff Turnbo
text: Food wasn't bad... But have you ever walked into a place where they all seemed to hate people or just all had a massive fight and you just walked into it .. that was them

name: Melly Mel G.
text: Never let's me down. Staff was friendly and courteous.

name: Rohit Soni
text: Love blaze pizza over any other pizza, this store like all other blaze locations is  awesome!

name: loreen majewski
text: Good thick dough, perfect crisp on the crust, and the ingredients. ..fresh, meaty, ample, and cozi delicioso! Bit of a wait but worth it. Friendly guys.

name: Re birth
text: It was my fianc√© and I first time ever coming to a Blaze pizza. There was a girl that specifically helped me out to figure the ways of Blaze lol. She was sweet but I definitely want everyone to get their recognition because the whole crew on the night of 6/21 was PHENOMENAL! Thank you for making my first experience a great one.

name: Anquanette Herndon
text: Me and my son love this place so much that he had his 7th Birthday Party here. The staff was so nice and accommodating to our large party of 20 kids dressed as superheroes. They  managed to serve us while also keeping up with the demands of ‚Ä¶More

text: First of all. I gotta say I am elated to post a Public review for Blaze Pizza, not only was the Pizza very good, so was the Staff, Great Chemistry and vibes, but what made an impression on Me was the NICE SIZE Clear Plastic cup for water. ‚Ä¶More

name: Anna McKenzie Saidla
text: Wonderful pizza! Easy to order. You get to watch them book it also which is neat!

name: A A
text: Excellent Pizza! It was my first time visiting this restaurant and the staff was friendly and guided me along the whole ordering process. The restaurant is clean and modern looking. There is plenty of seating inside and outside. The dough ‚Ä¶More

name: Ravi Vuppala
text: Good food. Service can be friendlier

name: Nikki Moss
text: Best pizza. That‚Äôs on PERIODT!

name: Raz Vine
text: Nice place for fast pizza.  Clean , new , nice music and friendly staff.  They checked on us twice while eating to make sure we are good.  I will recommend for a family with kids or just fast lunch.

name: Jay Y.
text: Lunch today was outstanding! BUT...if you do not get there before noon the line can be out the door and seating can be limited.

name: Dwababy G
text: Love this pizza restaurant.  Price is right and you can add as many toppings for the same price.

name: Bob Pendley
text: Great pizza. They burned our rolls twice, but the pizza was wonderful.

name: Neena C.
text: First time visiting this pizza spot and it did not disappoint! The pizza crust is just right and delicious, the staff is friendly and polite!! We‚Äôll be back for sure.

name: Katherine B
text: WOW!! Fantastic little pizza place! Super inviting workers! They greeted everyone who came in and were enthusiastic as they explained to first timers how the process works. ‚Ä¶More

text: I came here for the first time today and while the pizza is good, the process for actually getting it is a pain in the neck. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs the system they have that‚Äôs flawed or the employees. The system they have of putting names ‚Ä¶More

name: rohit murarka
text: It was a great experience, though I think the place is quite small. I had earlier visited the one located in Orlando, Disney Downtown which was far more bigger and better. The staff here seems to be in hurry and doesn‚Äôt give enough time to make your pizza. I somehow believe the service can be improved and hence 4 stars.

name: Patrick Tisdel
text: Cool inside, plenty of parking, fast, and inexpensive, but meh pizza. The staff was quick and nice, though.

name: Prasad Patil
text:
Good healthy option as far as pizza goes with good staff.
Better come in person than order online  as you will wait same amount of time.

name: Matthew O'Grady
text: Below average pizza all around, not a good selection of beer either. The toppings are limited and the dough is undercooked way too often. If you want a custom yet quick pizza, look elesewhere.

name: Salina Rosser
text: The food is bad the pizza is a very thin-crust it was like eating paper they put very little toppings and sauce.  Knots are so dry it's just bad.  It's not worth paying 11 for this meal. I have had better frozen pizza then this place serves.  The service was good friendly.

name: Jacob Wallace
text: Good quick place, pizza is always perfect

name: Meg Fisher
text: We LOVE that there is a restaurant with keto pizza crust!

name: Don Veal
text: First time here and I enjoyed it. I am mad at myself that I had not come sooner. Amazing job making my pizza and great friendly staff as well.

name: Dominique Davis
text: Meesh just remade our order because of the delivery  service Taking 1 hour to deliver. I really applaud his ‚Äúmake it right attitude‚Äù. Third party really is tarnishing brands currently. Way to make it right!

name: Simon Rosenberg
text: The concept of custom built pizza that you add the ingredients as you walk along the food counter was interesting but the young staff's enthusiasm was impressive.

name: Rohit Anand
text: I've visited there once. It was a bit busy probably because of the weekend. It still didn't took long to get my order though. This place has a kitchen with wood fire oven and assembly line method which let you make your own style of pizza ‚Ä¶More

text: Great experience. Friendly service, trendy atmosphere, excellent pizza, good value, plenty of parking. This is a great lunch spot!

name: Cuddling Wolf
text: Came on pi day for their "holiday" deal, insanely busy but still quick, fresh, and delicious!

name: Delphine Coleman
text: Excellent, the food is outstanding. The employees are very accomidating.

text: Every time I come to this location, I ask for extra cheeses on my build my own, the workers go from spoonful of cheese to pinches of cheese, why is it called build your own, per worker said‚Äùwe have to control our portions‚Äù, really??? Then ‚Ä¶More

text: Some of the best pizza I've ever had. It was a perfectly-cooked build-your-own pizza with cheese and pepperoni. It was really cheap and I wish I'd given a better tip because these guys seriously deserve it. Every member of the staff was super nice and made my lunch astounding. Thank you Blaze Pizza!

name: varunkumar yaramasu
text:
It was good place for hanging out with friends and family for a good pizza.

text:
Blaze Pizza

text: Went in with codes to get pizzas only one code would scan for some reason and they only honored one! Now i was picking up pizzas for two so now I have to go find dinner elsewhere....NEVER COMING BACK just go to 1000 Degrees Pizza!!!!and they have $3.14 per pizza all month long!!!!!

name: Jarred L.
text: Tried my hardest to get an order in to this location, but nothing seems to work properly. We want to provide them with our support, but with how early things are closing, there just isn't time to waste.

name: Jamila Porter
text: The pizza here is delicious -- from the crisp and flavorful crust to the nearly endless toppings you can add on (all of which are included in the "Build Your Own" price). The customer service is also great. One staff member in particular -- ‚Ä¶More

text:
First time visiting this restaurant on a random Saturday afternoon. Gotta say, I'm glad I took a leap of faith.
This spot offers quality size, fast made, but healthy personal pizzas . Quality, ‚Ä¶More

text: First, staff was unprepared and untrained, and took a while to get my order. That‚Äôs already bad.... The BIG problem is they gave us both pizzas burned, charcoal burned, and INSISTED that how it was done... we had to get rough... then, after 30 min they finished our pizzas, like this...  ...  VERY BAD experience...

name: Verna' Soljasgt' Martin
text: Introduced to Blaze in Bridgewater, New Jersey. Green Stripe is excellent.  I promise. If you like thin crust.

text: I usually like this place. This night, we ordered three personal pizzas. We got one pizza after about 15 minutes and the others after 30+ minutes. *Several* people who came in after us got their pizzas. When we finally got our pizzas they ‚Ä¶More

text: Made an order on the phone, saved me no time, they said 20 mins. Took 35 minutes from the time of call to get my pizza in the oven. Place seemed pretty disorganized.

name: jade Styles by Jade
text: Great Service, Nice Location. They had a Vegan Option and even offered to change their gloves. I loved the service. Thank you for an amazing lunch.

name: Niquel Jones
text: Love, love,love Blaze Pizza!! I like that you can build your own pizza. You can add as many toppings as you want.

name: Craig Paulk
text: Think of it as Subway-style pizza.  I walked in, picked the kind of pizza I wanted, loaded it with extra toppings (at no extra charge), then they had it ready for me within 10 minutes. ‚Ä¶More

name: Lysandra B
text: Always a great customer service experience at this location - today, Jordan helped us and paid special attention to some allergy concerns. He went out of his way to make sure that any product that had touched potential allergens was avoided ‚Ä¶More

name: Ashwini Jain
text: Best place to eat pizza.

name: Charles Lankau
text: Dairy-free cheese and meatless chorizo make for the best vegan pizza I have ever tried. The size is perfect for a full meal and can be split for a light and crispy snack. There are a few unique beverage options as well. Great concept, excellent execution. I will certainly be back.

name: Anthony Baker
text: Great pizza with good service!

name: Google Contributor
text: Cute spot with decent pizza.  Prices were affordable and there were enough options. They were out of a few roppings and the dough knots when I went.  Service was good.  Not a true bakers often but the crust came out well.  Small indoor seating area.  Overall three stars.  I probably wouldn't go back

name: Kim G
text: I built my own pizza with ALL the toppings I like at no extra charge. DELICIOUS! Customer service was excellent as staff was friendly and courteous.

name: Henry Williams
text: Did the build your own, ingredients tasted fresh, pizza was A1

name: Salt & Light
text: I wasn't mad at all. I customized my on pizza with lasagna ingredients. (Spicy red sauce, Italian sausage, meatballs, bacon, pepperoni, shredded mozzarella, ricotta, bell pepper, red onion, roasted garlic, fresh basil, spinach, black ‚Ä¶More

name: Heidi Schutzbach
text: Great pizza for a good price, but do. not. use their online portal. I got a coupon to order a pizza through their website, and it was not worth the excessive effort. I had do reload their website and re-input my information countless times ‚Ä¶More

name: Clayton Girls
text: The best pizza place ever and the customer service is everything.I really enjoyed my hand made pizza with amazing toppings.

name: Devondria Byrd
text: My pizza was not good at all. I will not return.

name: Nick Flores
text: They burned my pizza that I used my loyalty points to pay for. I see what my customer loyalty was worth to you blaze. The dining room was a mess but that's to be expected after lunch rush. They were moving the line and no one had to wait ‚Ä¶More

text: Good place to go for lunch!  Thin pizza, so I can easily eat the whole thing, by myself.  Highly customizable (think Subway, but with pizza).  They are missing a few toppings that I would like, such as sun dried tomatoes.  Also, some kind of Asian/Thai ingredients would be great!

name: Brian Rhodes
text: Fast, affordable, endlessly customizable. What more could you want. Oh yeah, delicious.

name: Nora Payne
text: The best pizza in town!!

name: Song Choi
text: Fresh ingredients and great sauce choices. Their pizzas are so good. I had an art lover (artichoke) and my bf built his own.

name: Ari C
text: I completely think that Blaze Pizza is underrated; it's literally THE BEST pizza I have ever tasted, and I have eaten a lot of pizza from other places. I especially love to get the "choose your own" pizza, and all of the toppings I've tried ‚Ä¶More

name: Ivanna Hernandez
text: Food was good, cauliflower crust was so delicious however the wait time was ridiculous. From ordering to getting called to get my pizza took 22 minutes. üò°üò±

name: A Miller
text: Love the fact that you can view the process from the start of your order to the end.  l prefer to go when it is not a crowd.  Otherwise, it can be reminiscent of the old lunch line days.  Friendly service, fresh ingredients, good eats...

name: Tommy Gerrin
text: The pizza here is some of the best I've had. It always tastes fresh and the ingredients are obviously quality. Very friendly staff as well.

name: Brad Carroll
text: Decent pizza for the price. The restaurant is clean, and the service is reasonable for the crowd level. The to-go boxes are nicely sized for half of a pizza and readily available for customers. The ingredients leave something to be desired, ‚Ä¶More

name: Eric Burkard
text: Excellent crust and service. Wallet-friendly, too. No anchovies, which is a negative, but not a deal breaker.

name: Briana Childs
text: Fresh, fast, and delicious! This picture has no filter, their pizza was just that good!!! (If you wanna order what I got, this was the 2-topping with pepperoni and spinach, with garlic on top and the pesto crust!)

name: Richard Childress

name: aisha turner
text: amazing vegan pizza!

name: Rostislav Tkachenko
text: Service is nice and quick. Pizza usually comes nice, taste good, and decent quality for the price.

name: Giovonni Fareed
text: Blazzin pizza cuz we blazinnn!

name: Patricia Glenn
text: I love the veggie with everything on it. Amazing fresh ingredients. Yummy just thinking about it.

name: Dante Martinez
text: It's a shame the old pizza place that was here had to close.  Blaze is a similar concept but cheaper and the quality of the pizzas is not as good.  Still, for the price you get a decent pizza and the unlimited toppings is a good deal. ‚Ä¶More

name: Aaron King
text: Great fresh and fast! Good prices too

text: Had the vine pizza was delicious.  Noisy to sit inside and eat. Outside, with this hot weather isn't the best option.  Everyone in our group enjoyed their pizzas definitely tasty.

name: Ann Roat
text: Pizza tastes awesome! Good price! Try veg out pizza with bacon and balsamic and olive oil drizzle.

name: Ellen Ballard
text: Would love to rate higher because food was good, but NOT child friendly. My 3 year old and I went for lunch and felt super unwelcome.

name: Chris Roseberry
text: Great pizza and salad for 10 bucks. Come and geeet sooome...

name: Dennis Legg
text: I love the pizza here.  Perfectly priced, and each pizza for each person built the way they want it.  Very good quality and very nice place!  Much higher quality than Papa Johns, Dominos, or Pizza Hut.

name: Joseph Fisher
text: Great service and food

name: Deuntae
text: The manager Jackie is amazing, her customer service is by far the best.

text: This place has a great concept. Build your own pizza! How cool is that? Unfortunately, lazy and inattentive employees ruin it's charm. ‚Ä¶More

name: Benita Duling
text: This. Pizza. Is. Amazing! You can choose a pizza type or build your own. There are diff types of crusts - regular,  keto, cauliflower...all thin and just crisp enough. With a great variety of toppings and sauces even my picky 6-year old was ‚Ä¶More

text: Best pizza in my opinion, doesn't matter what state or location. It is the best and freshest pie you can get super fast.

text: Great pizza, well made!

name: Keith Strickland
text: Food was good, staff was friendly and restaurant was clean. Biggest complaint is it was hard to hear my name called to get my food.

name: Elton Taylor

name: Sergi L.

name: Marissa Rodriguez
text: Quite possibly the worst pizza I've ever had. Rock hard, cardboard crust and super sweet sauce. Who wants sweet sauce on a pizza?! Hardly any cheese or toppings. The garlic knots were good but served with cold sauce.

name: Vismay Patel
text: Delicious, fresh and fast pizza. They never skimp on ingredients either. If you want more of a certain topping, no problem!

name: T Seams
text: Clean food item bar and great customer service!

name: Greg Smith
text: Britt made the best pizza we‚Äôve had to this point at Blaze. Great job, Britt... you‚Äôre a rock star!!!

name: Gozie N
text: The manager/team lead does a great job of running this location and always honors customer service values

name: Reema R
text: Really great crust and nice selection of toppings. However they are really stingy with cheese, a main ingredient in pizza. You get a tiny scatter of mozzarella that barely covers the pizza. I would prefer if they raised prices to account for the extra tablespoon of cheese that normal pizzas have.

name: clint padgett
text: Awesome pizza at a good price.  Appreciate they have cauliflower crust but wish they had whole wheat, too.  Lots of vegetable topping options.

name: Jemelle Wooten
text: The service was amazing, the food is ALWAYS good, and this is becoming my new favorite pizza place!

name: Rancho Iyer
text: Love the variety of sauce options. And it's quick.

name: Teena Atkins
text: I ordered a pizza for delivery @7:10. I was staying at a hotel less than a mile away. I was told the estimated time of delivery was 7:47. My pizza was finally delivered at nearly 9:00 pm and was completely cold. I ordered extra cheese and there were places on the pizza with no cheese at all. Very disappointed.

name: brian gleaton
text: Good food, service, and price

name: Cristopher Jackson
text: Nice atmosphere. Lots of choices for food. Different from typical pizza joints and not expensive. I really enjoyed it and will be back again.

name: V. Anne Simmons
text: We love Blaze pizza, but sadly will not come back.  The service has fallen with not getting orders right.  Also, the website does not remember my user ID and password (multiple times), which makes me lose my flames.  Sorry, bad experience all around.

name: Michelle Owen
text: It might be ok for someone wanting the keto crust.  My son got that.  I was not impressed with the over all flavor.  The meat lovers pizza only has 2 meats. The price was average.  I guess it just wasn‚Äôt my style of pizza.  And if you want a straw for your drink bring your own. They don‚Äôt believe in those there.

name: L Frett
text: Delicious pizza. Great customer service. Awesome prices.

name: Kitsune Fyora
text: So upset I can't come to this place more often! I love pizza, and I love how Blaze Pizza is like a Subway for Pizzas. Staff are always helping and ensuring you're getting the right ingredients. They even toast the desserts!

name: Eric Schwind
text: Wickedly fast pizza.  In and out under 10 minutes with the delish meat eater.

name: Angelia Balentine
text: I had the white top pizza which has a cream sauce,  mozzarella, garlic, bacon, red onion and chicken. It was my first time trying anything on the menu,  but it was Delicious! $5 for just a half pizza or $8.25 for the whole pizza.  Word of warning,  though: When they ask if you want a sprinkling of sea salt - say No Thanks.

name: Baily Timms
text: Entirely too busy. Very loud. Pizza isn't particularly great. We asked for light sauce, it was too loud for the person to hear it or they didn't care.

name: Bryan Black
text: great service/food!

name: William Satizabal
text: No doubt why people come here to make a line, awesome pizzas

name: S Harper
text: Love their pizza. Thin crust, fire grilled and fresh toppings. You can't beat the price. Wish there were more locations closer to where I live. I drive from Douglasville just to enjoy!

name: Deanna Lawson
text: 1st time and it was good. Busy but organized. I will return. Just curious, can orders be called in ahead of time?

name: Ray Miles
text: Interesting concept. Pizza assembly line. Fast and friendly. Would have rated 5 stars but the staff was talking to a customer and let 2 of the 3 pizzas we ordered burn a little.

name: Pu Guo
text: We love pizza from Blaze Pizza. Perfect!Also, the dough knots are my favoriteÔºÅ

name: Rico Scott
text: You get to customize your pizza. They're always made fresh to order. A lil bit on the $$ side for fast food but still good.

name: Chanan Kennedy
text: You can best the freshness of the ingredient options. Turns the pizza up on so many levels!

name: Christa Allen
text: The staff was great, the pizza was hot but the toppings on my pizza were very skimpy. Not worth the price

name: Justin Gibbs
text: It was a great experience. The staff was excellent and attended to us with superb precision specifically because we are vegan. We loved it and will be going there regularly. They even offered us glove changes for the preparing and finishing our pizza. Amazing!!!

name: Nichole Walford
text: The ingredients are always fresh! My favorite is the green stripe. The garlic knots are good too.

name: Jermaine Green
text: Great Food

name: MrBigR 504

text: Good, fresh options for pizza toppings and a nice place to grab a fast-casual meal.

name: Avik Bhattacharya
text: Fast , thin crust pizza, fully customizable . Wide variety of toppings . Gluten free and cauliflower crust available for those with sensitivity or trying to lay off the carbs

name: Sharon Holzmeyer
text: Only one 11 inch crust regular or cauliflower.  Needs more red sauce so it is not so dry, app didn't work. Workers were new or just slow.

name: Kim H
text: Pizzas are just the right size and they have a nice amount of toppings choices. I really appreciate the fact that you can get exactly what you want for a set price. The pizzaa come out quickly and are perfectly crispy. ‚Ä¶More

name: vamsi krishna
text: Good food. Excellent service. The staff were super friendly. They asked if it was my first time and when I answered yes, they were so helpful in explaining everything. And after the payment, I was like - damn! That was quick., only to hear a reply from them ‚Äúits fast-fired for a reason bro‚Äù. Cheers guys, Always down for another visit.

name: Chrys H
text: Update: make sure you cook the dough knots when ordered. I had to wait for the knots nearly 10 minutes AFTER my pizzas were done. No bueno. -1 star. Also no more chocolate chip cookies which is a travesty! Bring them back! -1 star. UPDATE ‚Ä¶More

name: C.J.
text: Great pizza with great people making the pizzas. Can't wait to return!

name: J Jinks
text: Always delicious and I'm not big on pizza

name: Chad H
text: Good pizza, pretty fast. I think Mod pizza is a little better, but this is still pretty good.

name: Angel Alexis
text: The pizza is amazing! Everything is so good but the salads. The lettuce is off or something. Yet the pizza is great.
